properties.title: Resources - Special Interest Groups - Jakarta Struts

subsection.name: Local
subsection.p: Atlanta Struts Users Group - The Atlanta Struts Users Group (ASUG) is a free, informal, all-volunteer, technically-savvy group of Atlanta Struts enthusiasts, professionals and zealots who keep each other informed about issues and innovations in the Struts Framework. Come to the meetings and contribute!

Silicon Valley Struts User Group - The Silicon Valley Struts User Group (SVSUG) meets on the first Wednesday of the month at various locations in the south bay. All levels of Struts user experience are welcome. Meetings are free and open to all.
